    • Field Detail

      • NDE_ATTRIBUTE_LOCATION

        public static final String NDE_ATTRIBUTE_LOCATION
        Hint. NDE Attribute For Outputting In the HEAD/BODY. Valid values are "HEAD" and "BODY". Currently used for inline NDEType.JS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

public static net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ComboBox getDirectorySelector(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDEType type)
        Get a directory selector for the specified type.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the component or null if not supported.

      • getUrlForNDE
